channel.title: Comments on: Third Time’s the Charm

item.title: By: First Order of Business | Grand Mighty
item.dc:creator: First Order of Business | Grand Mighty
item.description: [...] job well (via a sniffer test a la my nose), so I decided to just do it live. I bought a bottle of HEET for good measure, and then took the smog test. The car passed smog without issue. The NOx readings [...]
item.content:encoded: […] job well (via a sniffer test a la my nose), so I decided to just do it live. I bought a bottle of HEET for good measure, and then took the smog test. The car passed smog without issue. The NOx readings […]

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2010/07/third-times-the-charm/#comment-73">Bob Santoso</a>.
You can get it at most Auto store, I got mine from Kragen's

item.title: By: Kent
item.dc:creator: Kent
item.description: haha! nice bro! glad to see that everything worked well. now time to drive your heart out with this daily driver of yours. =]
